short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and notify all your Opened Pull Requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track and notify all your Opened Pull Requests form a BitBucket domain.
This extensions provides an UI similar to the BitBucket one for PR notifications.

Just add the extension, open it by clicking its icon and add the url of your bitbucket domain ( eg.: https://git.yourdomain.com ) on the configuration section.

Note: The url should be formatted as just shown and you should already be logged in!

Remember to pin your Bitbucket PR Notifier extension to have it always visible!
